summary: BLOCK A - BTC Final isolation testing completed. All major functionality working correctly. Backend APIs return expected data, frontend loads properly with AssetSelector displaying correct states (BTC active/orange, SPX and COMBINED disabled with 'soon').

minor_issues.impact: WebSocket functionality not working, but core APIs functional
Console errors but UI functionality intact

AssetSelector Component - BTC active (orange), SPX/COMBINED disabled
